Articles.Content: When I look at YouTube videos, the rockets have several engines and fuel tanks side by side. When I try the same thing, the structural supports do not connect to the rocket beside the main one. How do I connect them?

Not sure what you mean 'when I try it'.

The game lets you attach fuel tanks to the side of other fuel tanks. You can put engines at the bottom of a fuel tank. Building a rocket this way lets you stack things sideways.

You might need to tie the side-mounted stuff together with struts to hold it together.

There are also side decouplers. You can put those on the side of fuel tanks and mount stuff on them.
